hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Mas`ud:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "The sun and the moon do not eclipse because of someone's death or life but they are two signs amongst the signs of Allah, so pray whenever you see them

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ تَنْكَسِفُ الشَّمْسُ لِمَوْتِ أَحَدٍ وَلاَ لِحَيَاتِهِ
chapter.eng-name: The solar eclipse does not occur because of someone's death or life
